intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.text: Instituto Areluna ("we", "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website.

collection.title: 2. Data Collection
collection.text: We may collect the following types of information:

items.contact: Contact information (name, email, phone) when you fill out our forms.
items.cookies: Browsing data and cookies to improve user experience.

items.response: Respond to your contact requests and appointments.
items.improvement: Improve our services and website content.
items.marketing: Communicate news and offers (if you have consented).

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.text: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, or delete your personal data. To exercise these rights, please contact us at: rececao@institutoareluna.pt
